recipes.app_inmobi_debinst: Installs debians supporting custom start-stop script eg: daemontools

app_inmobi_debinst/starcmd.display_name: Mention the complete command used to start the service

app_inmobi_debinst/restart.display_name: Mention if service needs to be restarted after debian installations
app_inmobi_debinst/restart.description: Select if service needs to be restarted after debian installations

app_inmobi_debinst/latest.display_name: Mention if latest package should be installed if version name is mentioned for a packagename in debians list
app_inmobi_debinst/latest.description: If latest? is set to true, and if version numbers are missing in the debian names the latest package will be installed

app_inmobi_debinst/service.description: This name will be used as init.d service name if start-stop commands are not mentioned

app_inmobi_debinst/stopcmd.display_name: Mention the complete command used to stop the service

app_inmobi_debinst/debians.display_name: Mention the debians and thier versions in packagename=version format
app_inmobi_debinst/debians.description: If latest? is set to true, and if version numbers are missing in the debian names the latest package will be installed
